exceptions.exn: In environment T : System closedT1 : ClosedSystem LNN T n : nat f : naryFunc n A, B : Formula HRepA : (fix RepresentableHelp (n : nat) : naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop := match n as n0 return (naryFunc n0 -> Formula -> Prop) with | 0 => fun (f : nat) (A : Formula) => SysPrf T (iffH A (equal (var 0) (natToTerm f))) | S m => fun (f : nat -> naryFunc m) (A : Formula) => forall a : nat, RepresentableHelp m (f a) (substituteFormula LNN A (S m) (natToTerm a)) end) n f A x : fol.Formulas LNN x0 : folProof.Prf LNN x (iffH A B) H0 : forall g : fol.Formula LNN, In g x -> mem (fol.Formula LNN) T g Unable to unify "(fix RepresentableHalf1 (n : nat) : naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop := match n as n0 return (naryFunc n0 -> Formula -> Prop) with | 0 => fun (f : naryFunc 0) (A : Formula) => SysPrf T (impH A (equal (var 0) (natToTerm f))) | S m => fun (f : naryFunc (S m)) (A : Formula) => forall a : nat, RepresentableHalf1 m (f a) (substituteFormula LNN A (S m) (natToTerm a)) end) ?M2728 ?M2729 ?M2730" with "(fix RepresentableHelp (n : nat) : naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop := match n as n0 return (naryFunc n0 -> Formula -> Prop) with | 0 => fun (f : nat) (A : Formula) => SysPrf T (iffH A (equal (var 0) (natToTerm f))) | S m => fun (f : nat -> naryFunc m) (A : Formula) => forall a : nat, RepresentableHelp m (f a) (substituteFormula LNN A (S m) (natToTerm a)) end) n f B".

original: intros n f A B HAB HRepA. unfold RepresentableHelp in *. destruct HRepA as [H1A H2A]. split. - eapply RepresentableHalf1Alternate. + eapply iffE1. apply HAB. + apply H1A. - eapply RepresentableHalf2Alternate. + eapply iffE2. apply HAB. + apply H2A.
